mapper.insert: INSERT INTO machine_status_data ( timestamp, pm_id, status, error_code ) VALUES ( #{timestamp}, #{pmId}, #{status}, #{errorCode} )
INSERT INTO machine_status_data ( timestamp, pm_id, status, error_code ) VALUES ( NOW(), #{pmId}, 2, #{errorCode} )
INSERT INTO machine_status_data ( timestamp, pm_id, status, error_code ) VALUES ( NOW(), #{pmId}, #{status}, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT id, timestamp, pm_id, status, error_code FROM machine_status_data WHERE pm_id = #{pmId} ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT timestamp, status, error_code FROM machine_status_data WHERE pm_id = #{pmId} AND DATE(timestamp) = CURDATE() ORDER BY timestamp ASC
